## ARGOS locations for one male Pectoral Sandpiper.

```{r}
#| label: map-pesa
#| message: false
#| output-div: pesa

data(pesa56511)

pesa <- as_ctdf(pesa56511, time = "locationDate") |>
  cluster_track()

map(pesa)

```
